title: 52: OBITCH third times a charm!
description:
We have a super special surprise for our 50TH EPISODE this week because for the first time in OBITCHUARY history we’re spinning in our coffins together as we discuss all things lobotomy. We’ve got an obituary for a goodfella, one for a gal with the ultimate confidence, and one who was feeling the Holy Spirit. Oh and of course, we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminallllllls! 


SEE US LIVE IN IRVINE ON AUGUST 4TH: https://tinyurl.com/3fvwbsnz



Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:


https://historycollection.com/10-horrifying-examples-people-subjected-lobotomies-tragic-results/2/

https://allthatsinteresting.com/rosemary-kennedy

https://www.nps.gov/articles/000/rosemary-kennedy-the-eldest-kennedy-daughter.htm

https://listverse.com/2009/06/24/top-10-fascinating-and-notable-lobotomies/

https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20150710-the-gruesome-untold-story-of-eva-perons-lobotomy

https://www.merriam-webster.com/medical/topectomy

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychosurgery

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gottlieb_Burckhardt

https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1076/jhin.10.1.79.5634

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/António_Egas_Moniz

https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/corona-del-mar-ca/irma-levine-6560133

https://psychcentral.com/blog/the-surprising-history-of-the-lobotomy#recap

https://www.therichest.com/shocking/15-terrifying-images-of-real-lobotomies/

https://www.ranker.com/list/history-of-lobotomies/amandasedlakhevener

https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/mymemorials/obituary.aspx?n=dorothy-irene-rangel&pid=158348142 

https://www.verywellmind.com/bilateral-cingulotomy-380662

http://renaissancemag.com/humor/h0699.asp

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
